gurmukhi: ncI kwlkw sI km`KXw krwlM ] fkM fwkxI joD jwgMq jÍwlM ]100]327]
transliteration: Nachikaalkaa Sikamakhyaa Karaalan|| Dakan Daakani Jodh Jaagadt Jvaalan||100||327||
translation: The dreadful Kamakkhya like Kali danced and the Dakinis (Vampires) belched like flames.100.327.

gurmukhi: mcXo jor juDM htXo nwih koaU ] bfy C`qR DwrI pqI CqR doaU ]
transliteration: Machyo Jor Judhan Hatyo Naah(i) Kooo|| Bade Chhattra Dhaaripatichhatra Dooo||
translation: There was terrible war and no one retraced his steps; there were many great warriors and Sovereigns there;

gurmukhi: QpXo srb lokM AlokM ApwrM ] imty ju`D qy ey n joDw juJwrM ]101]328]
transliteration: Thapyo Sarab Lokan Alokan Apaaran|| Mite Juddh Te E Na Jodhaa Jujhaaran||101||328||
translation: This war continued in all the worlds and then warriors were not finished even in this dreadful war.101.328.

gurmukhi: ctpt suBt ibkt kty Jtpt BeI ABMg ] ltBt hty n rn GtXo Atpt imtXo n jMg ]102]329]
transliteration: Chatpat Soubhat Bikat Kate Jhatpat Bhaiabhan|| Lathbhat Hate Na Ran Ghatyo Atpat Mityo Na Jan||102||329||
translation: In that fierce fight the great warriors were chopped quickly; no warrior ran and retraced his steps and this war did not end.102.329.

gurmukhi: bIs l`C jug AYqu pRmwnw ] lry doaU BeI iksU n hwnw ] qb rwjw jIA mY AkulwXo ] nwk cFy miCMdR pY AwXo ]103]330]
transliteration: Bees Lachchh Joug Ait(u) Pramaanaa|| Dare Dooo Bhaikisina Haanaa|| Tab Raajaa Jeea Mai Akulaayo|| Naak Chadhe Machhindra Pai Aayo||103||330||
translation: The war continued from both sides for twenty lakh ages, but no one was defeated; then the king got agitated and came to Matsyendra.103.330.

gurmukhi: kih mun bir sB moih ibcwrw ] ey doaU bIr bfy birAwrw ]
transliteration: Kah(i) Mounndbar(i) Sabh Moh(i) Bichaaraa|| E Dooo Beer Bade Bariaaraa||
translation: (The king said), “O superb sage ! instruct me; both of them are great warriors;

gurmukhi: ien kw ibruD invrq n BXw ] ieno Cfwvq sB jgu gXw 104 ]331]
transliteration: In Kai Birudh Nidarat Na Bhayaa|| Ino Chadaavat Sabh Jag(u) Gadaa||103||331||
translation: Their opposition does not end and with the desire to get release from them, the whole world is going to end.104.331.

gurmukhi: ienY juJwvq sB koeI jUJw ] ien kw AMq n kwhU sUJw ] eyhY Awid hTI ibirAwrw ] mhwN rQI Aau mhwN BXwrw ]105]332]
transliteration: Inai Jujhaavat Sabh Koijoojhaa|| In Kaa Ant Na Kaahoo Soojhaa|| Ehai Aadh Hathibiriaaraa|| Mahaan Rathiau Mahaa Bhayaaraa||104||332||
translation: The whole world fought and fell on trying to kill them, but it could not know their end; these dreadful warriors are greatly persistent, greatly heroic and greatly terrible.105.332.
